nodes.text: Musk-hounds were a type of dog. After waking from a medically induced coma in Hanna City on the planet Chandrila following the Rebellion on Akiva, New Republic pilot Norra Wexley felt as tired as an old musk-hound.
Musk-hounds were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
